element.name: WIMContainer.FFilePath
element.short: The full path to the WIM file in the filesystem.

element.name: WIMContainer.FDesiredAccess
element.short: Flag indicating whether to read, write, or mount.
element.descr: WIMGAPI enables opening a WIM as read, write, or mount.

element.name: TWIMInfo.Embed
element.short: Embeds the specified XML into a given image index.
element.descr: This procedure takes a string representing an XML file and an optional index. The XML file is embedded into the given image or into the WIM if the index is not given.
